jcr:content.jcr:title: G502 - Hyjal RGB
jcr:content.searchTitle: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
jcr:content.seoDescription: Customize to your preferences with programmable RGB lighting,weight and balance tuning, and 11 programmable buttons. Delta Zero optics give you a competive edge.
jcr:content.seoPageTitle: Logitech G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB tunable gaming mouse

product_banner.productDesc: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse

testimonial.quotation: "From design and software to performance, the Logitech Proteus Core is hands-down the best all-purpose gaming mouse on the market."

image_banner_copy_59.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse

banner_copy_block.mainDescription: G502 is critically acclaimed and tops the charts in popularity. The extreme performance, premium build quality, maximized gaming features and incredible comfort combine for a truly exceptional gaming experience.

bannercopyblock.mainDescription: G502 is critically acclaimed and tops the charts in popularity. The high performance, premium build quality, advanced gaming features and incredible comfort combine for a truly exceptional and highly customizable gaming experience.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

item2.featuretitle: Fully ProgrammableAdvanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

copyblock.mainDescription: G502 comes equipped with the PMW3366 optical sensor with zero acceleration, smoothing, or filtering across the entire DPI range (200-12,000DPI). That means you get exceptional tracking accuracy and consistent responsiveness no matter what sensitivity you set the mouse to.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

Add even more control to your game with quick DPI shifting from low to high sensitivity. Use the thumb button to transition between headshot-precise low-sensitivity targeting to lightning-fast high-DPI maneuvers. Cycle up and down through as many as five DPI settings with a click. Three DPI indicator lights tell you which setting you are on. Program these DPI settings with Logitech Gaming Software (LGS) or use the default settings that work great out-of-the-box.

Unlock the scroll wheel for hyper-fast continuous scrolling to spin quickly through long pages, or lock it down for single click precision scrolling. The weighty, metal wheel delivers confident, smooth and satisfying control for either mode.

A wide variety of weight and balancing configurations, custom RGB lighting, 11 programmable buttons, on-the-fly DPI shift settings, desk surface tuning and more. Personalize G502 for your gaming setup and style with Logitech Gaming Software.Advanced features require Logitech Gaming Software, available for download at logitechg.com/downloads

media_tile.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
media_tile.text: Fine tune mouse feel and glide to your advantage. Five 3.6g weights come with G502 and are configurable in a variety of front, rear, left, right and center weighted configurations. Experiment with the alignment and find the sweet spot to enhance your gaming performance.

media_tile_copy.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
media_tile_copy.text: LIGHTSYNC technology is next generation RGB that can be driven  by games, audio, or your screen to deliver the most immersive RGB experience ever. Select from a full spectrum of approximately 16.8 million colors and synchronize lighting animations and effects with your other Logitech G devices. Customize it all quickly and easily using Logitech Gaming Software.

media_tile_copy_1282002099.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
media_tile_copy_1282002099.text: Use Logitech Gaming Software to program your favorite commands and macros to each of the 11 buttons. Build, crouch, melee, heal … put your power moves at your fingertips.

media_tile_copy_1282_1525079967.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
media_tile_copy_1282_1525079967.text: Optimize the G502 sensor accuracy by fine tuning the optical sensor to your playing surface and get improved precision and responsiveness. Tuning only takes a few moments using Logitech Gaming Software. G502 has presets for Logitech G gaming mouse pads: G240 and G440.

media_tile_copy_1282.altText: G502 Proteus Spectrum RGB Tunable Gaming Mouse
media_tile_copy_1282.text: Use Logitech Gaming Software to save your settings to each of the three memory slots on the mouse and take them with you. Your saved settings will work on any PC without additional software or any login required.

copyblock.mainDescription: In addition to the core performance and personalization features, many details were thoughtfully designed: Look for primary buttons rated to 20 million clicks with mechanical microswitches, braided cable with hook and loop cable tie, rubberized grips, magnetic weight-cavity door, and more.

_x0034_.text: Max. acceleration: > 40 GTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Max. speed: > 400 IPSTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0032_.text: PTFE Feet: 250-km rangeTested on Logitech G240 Gaming Mouse Pad

_x0035_.text: Internet access for Logitech Gaming Software (optional)
